summary: Macros and menus for django templates
name: django_templates.vim
description:
Almost each django template keyword or filter may be accessed by its short cut (and by the menu if using a GUI) in each of 3 modes.
If you don't like to use "<F8>" as a trigger you can change it to, for examle "?".
Open asp.vim in Vim editor and substitute :%s/<F8>/?/g
